name: Surgeworks
tag_list: mobile-apps, development, design, web-apps, ios, magento
overview:
Surgeworks is a full-service mobile design and development shop specializing in helping companies deliver media-rich content and reference applications using quality design and UXP with a solid programming architecture.

Surgeworks Inc. is a global company based in the US with dedicated developers in Rome, Croatia, Brazil, and Australia. The Company also has a history of excellence in Web App development design, as well as an ecommerce team of Magento experts.

This year, Surgeworks Inc. won the 2011 About.com Readers Choice for best app, website, and podcast for one of their reference apps. Surgeworks mobile iOS experienced team of developers has been putting apps in the app store since the iPhone’s first introduction into software development in 2007. The Company now offers cross-platform mobile development as well, and launched a new Company website in May 2011.
